channel.title: Development Environment on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Development Environment on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials

item.title: Prerequisites of Project Dovetail™ Development Environment
item.description: Go Programming Language and Toools Project Dovetail™ CLI is written in Go Programming Language, and it uses a few Go tools to package dependencies and resources Go version 1.11.x is required go-bindata govendor Flogo Libraries Project Dovetail™ smart contract go runtime is built on Project Flogo™, please make sure the correct version of flogo libraries in on your GOPATH flogo-lib v0.5.5 flogo-contrib v0.5.5 go get github.
